name: Formplus
author: Formplus

sections.description:
Formplus is a complete form building and database management solution that makes it easy to create customized contact forms, payment forms, application forms, feedback forms, mailing list subscription forms, and so much more.
The Formplus form builder integrates with cloud storage solutions like Google Drive and Microsoft OneDrive as well as online payment gateways like PayPal and Stripe.Designed with you in mind,the Formplus plugin lets you add forms to your website pages through a widget.
Simply add the form shortcode to your page, and your form will be added immediately.Formplus make it easy for you to create and embed online forms on your website, no technical knowledge necessary.Here are some of the features that make Formplus, the most powerful form builder compatible with WordPress.

Features

Mobile-Friendly Forms

Embed your online forms on any page of your WordPress website and format the size of your forms to fit. Formplus forms are SEO friendly and will have you collecting data with ease.

Customization

Formplus form builder allows you to create and customize your registration forms, contact forms and more. Simply download the plugin, sign up to Formplus and start creating beautiful forms for your website.

Drag & Drop Forms

The form builder allows you to create powerful forms within minutes – simply sign up to Formplus, drag and drop your desired form fields in the builder and create your form in no time. It requires no code to create a form and with it, you can create custom forms in less than five minutes.

Pre-built Form Templates

Make your form building process easy when you start off with a pre-built template. Whatever it is that you are trying to build, Job application forms, contact forms, payment forms etc, Formplus has hundreds of templated to help you get started.

Secure Forms

All Formplus forms are SSL enabled, making sure that all connections between your forms and our servers are secure 100% of the time. To add an extra layer of security in your forms, use CAPTCHA to keep your form data safe from spammers.

Email Notification

You can receive email notifications whenever you a new submission is made or send out
autoresponder emails to respondents whenever you receive a new submission.

Smart Form Confirmation

Show a custom success message, or redirect respondents to a custom thank you page after they have submitted.

Flexible and Unlimited File Uploads

With unlimited file uploads, respondents can submit files, photos, or videos via your contact forms without any restriction.

Multi-Page Forms

Split long forms into multiple pages to increase completion rate and accuracy.

Conditional Logic

Show or hide form fields based on answers provided by respondents, giving you short forms with a better conversion rate.

Electronic Signature Forms

Collecting electronic signatures via online forms is made easy with Formplus. All you need to do is add a signature field to your online forms.

Geolocation

Add geolocation to your forms to pinpoint the physical location of the person who is filling out your form.

Form Analytics and Reports

Gather useful insights from forms such as total form views, unique views, abandonment rate, conversion rate, the average time it takes to complete a form, top devices, and the countries your form views are from.

Multi-user Accounts

Collaborate better across your organization by adding multiple users across your account.

Approvals and Workflows

Combine a powerful online form builder with logic to implement flexible automation across your organization

Field Validation

Gather clean and error-free data when you set validation limits on form fields.

Redirect After Submission

Redirect your respondents to another website or form after successful form submission.

Lookup Field

Need a way to cut form filling time by at least half? Use the lookup field to cross transfer values from other forms and populate options in a new form.

Accept Payments Online with Secure payment forms

Use Formplus to create secure payment forms and accept online payments right from your website. We integrate with popular payment platforms such as PayPal, Stripe, and Flutterwave, so you can collect payments from all over the world.

Here are some forms you can create using Formplus:

  • Application Forms
  • Contact Forms
  • Quizzes
  • Order Forms
  • Surveys
  • Payment Forms
  • Approvals and Workflows
  • Self-calculating forms
  • Online signature forms
  • Inventory forms
  • Employee review forms
  • And so much more!

Pricing

To get started, create an account with Formplus and sign up to any of the plans. You get to try it free for 21 days and during that period you get to use all the features, without adding a credit card.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

Creating a form

  1. Sign up on formplus.
  2. Create a form and copy the form’s wordpress shortcode from the share page.
  3. Simply add the form shortcode to your page or post, and your form will be added immediately.
sections.faq:
What is Formplus?

Formplus is an easy-to-use form builder that currently serves thousands of businesses and organizations across the world. With over 100 form templates available, we make it easy for anyone to create mobile responsive forms and receive data easily.

Where can I create a Formplus account?

On www.formplus.us. To set up Formplus forms on your WordPress website, sign up to Formplus and create a form before embedding it in your website.

How long is the free trial?

You can explore Formplus on trial free for 21-days. During this period, you can use all Formplus features including customized form links, email invitations, form calculations, lookup field, and so much more. After 21 days, you will need to upgrade to any of our plans to continue creating forms and receiving responses.

How can I add a form to my website?

Adding a form to your blog post or web page is very easy to do with this Formplus plugin. Go to the Formplus Share page and copy the WordPress embed code. Paste this code on your blog post or any page of your website that you want the form to be seen.

What kinds of forms can I create?

With Formplus you can create contact forms, event registration forms, surveys, payment forms, signup forms, feedback forms, Stripe forms, PayPal forms, straw polls, file upload forms and appointment booking forms. There are over 100 optimized form templates on JotForm. Browse, select one and go straight to customizing it for your website.

Will Formplus Forms work with my chosen theme?

Yes; Formplus Forms will work with any theme that have been coded following WordPress guidelines and best practices. You may also add some styling to make it match with your website even more.

short_description: Formplus Simple Form Builder | Contact Forms, Quizzes & Application forms
